fullText: Nathan Lane and John Slattery are perfectly cast as the cynical newspaper veterans who manipulate truth for headlines in this crackling revival of the Ben Hecht-Charles MacArthur comedy.
dtliExcerpt: Nathan Lane and John Slattery are perfectly cast as the cynical newspaper veterans who manipulate truth for headlines in this crackling revival of the Ben Hecht-Charles MacArthur comedy.
